stimulusHtml: Which of the following is true about the curve x 2 âˆ’ x y + y 2 = 3 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@42C8@ at the point ( 2 ,   1 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D8E@ ?
choicesHtml: d y d x MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D37@ exists at ( 2 ,   1 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D8E@ , but there is no tangent line at that point.

d y d x MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D37@ exists at   ( 2 ,   1 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D8E@ , and the tangent line at that point is horizontal.

d y d x MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D37@ exists at   ( 2 ,   1 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D8E@ , and the tangent line at that point is neither horizontal nor vertical.
